title: Let's travel
description: A web development project for a hotel registration and booking system, with two user levels: Administrators, who manage hotels, and customers, who book accommodations.

title: Online Store
description: A front-end web project focused on utilizing HTML resources, featuring a well-designed and modern graphic interface, with a responsive layout, including an interactive and responsive menu button.

title: Song Finder
description: A web application that uses iTunes to search for music by artist or band and returns the results in a JSON package, allowing users to listen to pre-selected tracks.
